There is no sufficient information to provide a list of potential diagnoses. Please consult with a medical professional as they are qualified to make diagnoses based on a combination of symptoms, medical history, and a physical examination. Self-diagnosing can be dangerous and it is crucial to seek the guidance of a healthcare provider for any health concerns.
